title: 369. Andy, Maj Toure & DJ CTI: FBI Threw Documents On The Floor, Kim Gardner Only Fined $750... To Be Continued
itunes:title: 369. Andy, Maj Toure & DJ CTI: FBI Threw Documents On The Floor, Kim Gardner Only Fined $750... To Be Continued
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ are joined in the studio by Black Guns Matter & Solutionary Lifestyle founder Maj Toure. They discuss what solutions are necessary to improve the quality of life for impoverished communities, why it's essential to understand the basics of firearm safety, and the importance of diving deeper into issues concerning all Americans.
